Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin</groupId>
  <artifactId>download-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>1.4.0</version>
  <type>maven-plugin</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin:download-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:1.4.0'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin" name="download-maven-plugin" rev="1.4.0">
  <artifact name="download-maven-plugin" type="maven-plugin" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin', module='download-maven-plugin', version='1.4.0')
)

Gradle/Grails

compile 'com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin:download-maven-plugin:1.4.0'

Scala SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin" % "download-maven-plugin" % "1.4.0"

Leiningen

[com.googlecode.maven-download-plugin/download-maven-plugin "1.4.0"]
